content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad you like the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In this negotiation in regard to the rental price for this modern, well-located one-bedroom, I aim to secure the most affordable deal. Let's start by expressing a lower-end interest but with room for compromise. 'I consider a fair price for this apartment to be significantly less than the current market rate, say around 700 Euros per month!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is much lower than what I am looking for.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position now, I'll adjust my inquiry. 'While respecting your expectations, I seek a more moderate reduction, possibly around 10% off the current market price. Is this a starting point for further discussions?' This demonstrates a willingness to compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 10% off the market price is still not enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing the gap, I'll show flexibility. 'I understand your perspective. Could we perhaps consider a mid-term lease, or discuss additional incentives, such as a reduced deposit or waived agency fees, in order to meet for a mutually agreeable price?' This suggests exploring other avenues.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are not discussing the rental price. I am only interested in the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologies for the misstep. To refocus, 'Given our previous discussions, I'm still committed to attaining a more competitive rental figure. Might a reduction of, let's say, 15% off the market rate be a potential starting point for us to work with? I remain open for further price-related negotiations.' This reaffirms the objective.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 15% off the market price is still not enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In an attempt to bridge the gap, I'll present a more significant concession. 'I appreciate your firm stance. In an effort to find a mutually satisfactory solution, I'm prepared to consider a 20% discount from the current market rate. Is this a base for more constructive dialog on the rental price?' This shows a readiness to increase the offered reduction.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 20% off the market price is still not enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
